58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"Select *
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.existSelected","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,if({subParam} like '%mAl%','The address must contain a flat or house and road. ','The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. '),''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mAl%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%'or {subParam} like '%mAl%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
The removable media policy (2012) states that:

  1. data will only be allowed to be saved to PCC approved (encrypted) devices
  2. Bluetooth connections will be turned off.

Please note: this only applies to saving data from the network to your device, you will still be able to read or transfer data from your device.

If you feel you have a valid business reason to transport personal and sensitive data, and need an encrypted device or IS solution, you must complete this form. We are currently providing 32GB USB sticks. Equally, if you already have a device which you feel requires an exception to the policy, you must complete this form. Otherwise you will be unable to save data from the PCC network to the device.

Please complete the form with as much information as possible to explain the business need, and details of any removable media equipment that needs to attach to any PCC device or where a Bluetooth connection is required.

Requests will be reviewed and assessed by IT who will contact you to agree a solution based on your need.

props.label: concSummary
props.defaultValue:
concat('#tlName#m',{staff/First_Name_out},' ',{staff/Surname_out},'#z',
'#tlDepartment#m',{staff/Department:display},'#z',
if({staff/Phone_Number_out} != '', concat(
'#phPhone#m',{staff/Phone_Number_out},'#z'),''),
if({staff/Mobile_Number_out} != '', concat(
'#phMobile#m',{staff/Mobile_Number_out},'#z'),''),
if({staff/Email_Address} != '', concat(
'#emEmail#m',{staff/Email_Address},'#z'),''),
'#tlType of request#m',{isThisANewRemova},'#z',
if({isThisANewRemova}='exception request', concat(
'#taNet ID and location of PCC equipment#m',{netID},'#z'),''),
'#taDescribe the type of information being transferred#m',{describeTheType},'#z',
'#taDescription of request and business neeed#m',{descriptionOfReq},'#z',
if({isThisANewRemova}='new request', concat(
'#taWould you like and encrypted or non encrypted device?#m',{encrypted},'#z',
'#taCost code#m',{cost},'#z')),
'#tlDate of request#m',{date},'#z')
